modName: Rachel - Follower - Nicely Made - 2 New Spells - Useful
summary: This Mod Will Add A Companion Very Sexy Actually. 2 New Spells Will Also Be Added. They Are The Upgraded Version of Normal Flames And Frost.
descriptionHtml:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
What Will this Mod add? 
- A New Female Npc/Follower - Which Is Very Beautiful. 
- Here Name Is Rachel And you WIll Find Her Working At The Riverwood Trader.
- She Doesn\'t Have Any Good Armour Because She Is poor :(. Make Sure you Give her Something good :)
- 2 New Spells. They Are An Upgraded Version Of The Normal Flames/Frost.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Mod Requirements 
-> http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8583 - The Ashen Race - HD
-> http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168 - Apachii - U will Need IMPORTANT - > You Will need Main File AND ApachiiSkyhairFemale v 1.0 (very Important)
U Will find v 1.0 In the Optional files Of His Awesome Mod. Thanks!
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Future - Now That I Finally Understood How i Make Such Awesome Mods I Will Be Making ALOT so make Sure U Friend me :3
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
I Do Not Allow Copying On My Mod. If you Are to do this Please, Contact me Or Give Me Credit.
Thanks.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Credits To
-> Seren4XX For The Awesome Ashen Race :D
-> Apachii For His Amazing Hair Models
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Last Words. 
If you Do NOT like this Mod. Dude Do not be a hate. Simply Click The Back Button On Your Top Left Screen.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
author: unkownRb
